titles.title: A bill to revise the boundaries of John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System Jekyll Island Unit GA-06P.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary: 4/3/2006--Introduced. Replaces the map subtitled "GA-06P", relating to the John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System unit designated as Coastal Barrier Resources System Jekyll Island Unit GA-06P, that is included in the set of maps entitled "John H.Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System", and referred to in the Coastal Barrier Resources Act, with the map relating to the unit entitled "John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System Jekyll Island Unit GA-06P".
